name: The Trials of Odysseus Kent

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/The Trials of Odysseus Kent/Odysseus.exe

content:
files:
- file1: http://www.fullyramblomatic.com/games/odywin.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/The Trials of Odysseus Kent/Odysseus.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:

    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/The Trials of Odysseus Kent
    file: $file1
wine:
  Desktop: true
